alert.note: Alert for Osceola (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:31AM CDT until July 12 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LYON...OSCEOLA...EASTERN SIOUX AND O`BRIEN COUNTIES... At 529 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ocheyedan to near Archer to near Marcus, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Primghar, Ocheyedan, Melvin, Harris, Hartley and Sutherland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
